content.raw:
Big numbers in the test. In my local testing runs:

* 2000 nodes publishing 10 times ~ 1.7Gb used
* 1000 nodes publishing 10 times ~ 0.4Gb used
* 2000 nodes publishing 5 times ~ 0.8Gb used

It would be nice to know what was the origin of this test (the regression issue) to see how can be reduced. If unknown, I would go for split the test in two: one with 2k nodes publishing around 5 times, another with 1k nodes publishing 10 times.
content.html:
Big numbers in the test. In my local testing runs:

  • 2000 nodes publishing 10 times ~ 1.7Gb used
  • 1000 nodes publishing 10 times ~ 0.4Gb used
  • 2000 nodes publishing 5 times ~ 0.8Gb used

It would be nice to know what was the origin of this test (the regression issue) to see how can be reduced. If unknown, I would go for split the test in two: one with 2k nodes publishing around 5 times, another with 1k nodes publishing 10 times.
